page.title: 09BARSHAW PARK -PAISLEY
page.content:
Barshaw Park is the biggest park in our area. It is approximately one quarter of a square kilometre in size and is situated at the corner of Arkleston Road and Glasgow Road. It has facilities for everyone no matter their taste. The leisure facilities of the park include: B.M.X. track, boating pond, tennis courts, doggy park, crazy golf, putting green, miniature railway, assault course and a municipal golf course and bowling green.
One of the main attractions of Barshaw is the one year old B.M.X. track specially designed for B.M.X. bikes which have become popular recently. They are sturdy bikes for performing stunts and have padded handlebars and frame. The park occasionally hosts special events e.g. Funfair Day.
